## Content Quality Checklist
<!-- Verify all items before requesting review -->

### Documentation Standards
- [ ] Content follows handbook writing style (clear, concise, action-oriented)
- [ ] Proper markdown formatting is used throughout
- [ ] All internal links use correct format: [`filename.ext`](path) or [`function()`](path:line)
- [ ] External links are descriptive and properly formatted
- [ ] Code examples include proper syntax highlighting
- [ ] Headers follow consistent hierarchy (H1 > H2 > H3 > H4)

### Content Structure
- [ ] Content is organized logically with clear sections
- [ ] Examples are practical and tested
- [ ] Templates/checklists are complete and usable
- [ ] Content serves the intended audience level
- [ ] Prerequisites and dependencies are clearly stated

### Integration & Navigation
- [ ] Content integrates well with existing handbook structure
- [ ] Related practices are properly cross-referenced
- [ ] Navigation links are updated where needed
- [ ] Tags are appropriate and follow tagging guidelines
- [ ] [`tags-index.md`](../tags-index.md) updated if new tags added

### Technical Validation
- [ ] All links work correctly (internal and external)
- [ ] Code examples are syntactically correct
- [ ] Instructions have been tested/validated
- [ ] No broken references or missing files
- [ ] Proper file naming conventions followed

## Review Requests
### Specific Feedback Needed
<!-- What specific areas would you like reviewers to focus on? -->

- [ ] Content clarity and organization  
- [ ] Completeness of examples
- [ ] Integration with existing content
- [ ] Writing style and tone

### Subject Matter Experts
<!-- Tag relevant SMEs for review -->
@mention-relevant-experts

---

## For Reviewers

### Review Checklist
- [ ] Content is technically accurate and current
- [ ] Writing is clear and follows handbook style
- [ ] Examples are practical and complete
- [ ] Content integrates well with existing handbook
- [ ] All links and references work correctly
- [ ] Tags and metadata are appropriate
- [ ] Target audience and complexity level are appropriate

### Approval Criteria
- [ ] Content quality meets handbook standards
- [ ] No technical errors or outdated information
- [ ] Proper integration with existing content
- [ ] All checklist items completed by contributor

**Review Timeline**: 
- Small changes (typos, links): 1-2 business days
- Medium changes (new sections): 3-5 business days  
- Large changes (new practices): 1-2 weeks

Your contribution helps make this handbook a valuable resource for the entire engineering team.
